mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (name, login_id, password, email, job_group, job_role, career_years) VALUES (#{name}, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{jobGroup}, #{jobRole}, #{careerYears})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, name, login_id, password, email, job_group, job_role, career_years, created_at, updated_at FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT member_id, name, login_id, password, email, job_group, job_role, career_years, created_at, updated_at FROM member WHERE login_id = #{loginId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name = #{name}, email = #{email}, job_group = #{jobGroup}, job_role = #{jobRole}, career_years = #{careerYears}, updated_at = now() WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
